cause.description:
Provides wheelchairs at no cost to the physically disabled poor in developing countries on a non-discriminatory basis.
Please see the Narration Jim Carrey made for Free Wheelchair Mission
http://fwmfiles.com/videos/pcs1.html
1. Faith based however does not discriminate others
cause.mission: Transform lives through the gift of mobility to the disabled worldwide
cause.name: Free Wheelchair Mission
